meanings.definition: A group of countries or regions under a single supreme authority.
meanings.sent1: The ancient empires ruled vast lands with many different peoples.
meanings.sent2: Throughout history, empires have risen and fallen, shaping the world.
meanings.sent3: The empires decided to have a picnic to discuss their territories.
meanings.sent4: Her influence over the company was like that of an empires, controlling all aspects.
meanings.sent5: The image of empires stretching across continents is awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: A large and powerful organization or group.
meanings.sent1: Tech empires like Google and Apple dominate the industry.
meanings.sent2: The entertainment empires in Hollywood produce blockbuster movies.
meanings.sent3: The empires of fast-food chains battled for the title of the best burger.
meanings.sent4: In the business world, mergers create empires of influence and wealth.
meanings.sent5: The fashion empires set trends that influence global styles.
